sourceFiles.description: The path to the local files that you wish to upload. In the case of a static site, these should already be compiled (ie webpack).

bucketName.description: The name of the S3 bucket where the files should be uploaded.

region.description: The AWS region where requests will be sent. Optional, will default to the local system default.

profile.description: The AWS credentials profile that will be used to make requests. Optional, default system credentials will be used if omitted.

chunkSize.description: The number of files that will be present in each chunk. Files in chunks are uploaded in parallel.
